author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Lavrov says to discuss how to save Iran nuclear deal with Zarif: Ifax
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said he would discuss how to try to save the Iran nuclear deal with Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif in Moscow later on Monday, the Interfax news agency reported.
FILE PHOTO: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov attends a meeting with his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif in Moscow, Russia April 28, 2018. REUTERS/Grigory Dukor Lavrov was cited as saying that U.S. President Donald Trump’s announcement last week that Washington would withdraw from the deal had created a “crisis situation,” the news agency reported.
Reporting by Andrey Ostroukh; Editing by Andrew Osborn
